activities.name: Copy requests
activities.description: Copy requests data from CSV (stored on Power BI Gateway VM) to Azure SQL

activities.name: Calculate fields
activities.description: Update calculated fields (for example, SLA formula, datetime conversions, business hours difference) for time saving in queries

activities.name: Copy sessions
activities.description: Copy sessions data from CSV (stored on Power BI Gateway VM) to Azure SQL

activities.name: Copy answers
activities.description: Copy answers data from CSV (stored on Power BI Gateway VM) to Azure SQL

activities.name: Update clients
activities.description: Transport [UNIDADE ATENDIMENTO] field from answers table to requests table, for time saving in queries

activities.name: Copy table answers
activities.description: Copy anwers table data from CSV (stored on Power BI Gateway VM) to Azure SQL

activities.name: Extract CAPEX
activities.description: Copy NFD tickets to REQUESTIA_CAPEXNFD table, solving timeout in Microsoft Flow that send weekly mail from sergio.queiroz@opty.com.br account

activities.name: Extract TISS
activities.description: Copy TISS tickets to specific table, solving timeout in Microsoft Flow that send weekly mail from sergio.queiroz@opty.com.br account

activities.name: Send notification
activities.description: Generic pipeline for sending email using Azure Logic App
